name: Lose friends by sending emojis
description:
Lose friends by sending emojis is a game about social survival being an asshole (or at least a very inconsiderate person).

You must hold on to your friends and family as much as you can while answering all text messages with a single emoji. If that is not enough, you'll get less and less options to choose from as you go further in.

Right now the game features:

  • 8 characters with huge backstories and no repetition of dialogue whatsoever
  • 70 emojis to pick from
  • A snobby looping jazz track composed by a genius musical team called SiMiSol
  • Guest writing from the man, the myth, the Row
  • A fully working REAL TIME clock

SiMiSol are:

  • Joaquin Bellas 
  • Jeniffer De León 
  • Gonzalo Fleitas 
  • Damián Montes de Oca 
  • Marcello Palermo

This game was made in less than 24 hours during Jam2Jam's awesome WinterJam 2022 with the theme 'Language'.
